docs.snippet: ABBEY was making it, costarring with Sidney Poitier in "For Love of Ivy" -- a role, the press release had proclaimed, which "could catapult Abbey Lincoln toward major movie stardom." I remembered standing in the control room of a recording studio ...
docs.lead_paragraph: ABBEY was making it, costarring with Sidney Poitier in "For Love of Ivy" -- a role, the press release had proclaimed, which "could catapult Abbey Lincoln toward major movie stardom." I remembered standing in the control room of a recording studio six years ago with a young trumpet player as we watched Abbey listening to a playback of her singing.

docs.lead_paragraph: MORE than a year has passed since Arthur Schlesinger Jr. announced that the time had come "to blow the whistle before the current outburst of revisionism regarding the origins of the cold war goes much further." Yet the outburst of revisionism shows no signs of subsiding.

docs.snippet: ATHENS, Jan. 12 -- "Informal" top-level diplomatic contacts between the United States Embassy in Athens and the new Greek Government were resumed this week. All the embassies in Athens suspended contacts with the Government of Premier George Papad...
docs.lead_paragraph: ATHENS, Jan. 12 -- "Informal" top-level diplomatic contacts between the United States Embassy in Athens and the new Greek Government were resumed this week. All the embassies in Athens suspended contacts with the Government of Premier George Papadopoulos, set up Dec. 13 after King Constantine failed to topple the Athens regime.
docs.abstract: Govt sets up councils to dismiss or retire officers who backed King Constantine's attempted countercoup; 45 officers retired from armed forces since Dec 13
